Room.Name: Netherworld Lane
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Netherworld Lane, north of the Necropolis.
Room.LongDescription: The Nevermore Funeral Services building is located to the south. A number of your comrades have ended up there, as they cater specifically to the heroes of Oceancrest. On the north, there is a fresh fruit stand where you can buy a variety of freshly, grown fruits and vegetables from the Bushman Farm.
